content: I am a Lecturer in Health Data Science at the University of Aberdeen. I am a member of the Aberdeen Centre for Health Data Science, and I develop and use computational tools with the aim to improve human health. I am very active in public engagement with research. I aim to be an advocate for women in science, and encourage young people to consider careers in STEM.
summary: I am a Lecturer in Health Data Science at the University of Aberdeen. I am a member of the Aberdeen Centre for Health Data Science, and I develop and use computational tools with the aim to improve human health.
title: Dimitra Blana
